mapper.insert: insert into delivery values(#{dlvrNo}, #{ordNo}, #{dlvrEmpno}, sysdate,'N', sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from delivery order by dlvr_no
mapper.update: update delivery set ord_no=#{ordNo}, dlvr_empno=#{dlvrEmpno}, dlvr_cmpl_dttm=sysdate where dlvr_no=#{dlvrNo}
mapper.delete: update delivery set dlvr_cmpl_yn='Y' where dlvr_no=#{dlvrNo}
mapper.select: select d.dlvr_no,d.dlvr_empno,o.ord_sum_qty,d.dlvr_strt_dttm, d.dlvr_cmpl_yn, d.dlvr_cmpl_dttm, e.emp_nm,e.mobile_phn_no from delivery d, orders o,employee e where d.ord_no=o.ord_no and d.dlvr_empno=e.emp_no

select d.dlvr_no,d.dlvr_empno,o.ord_sum_qty,d.dlvr_strt_dttm, d.dlvr_cmpl_yn, d.dlvr_cmpl_dttm, e.emp_nm,e.mobile_phn_no from delivery d JOIN orders o on(d.ord_no=o.ord_no) JOIN employee e on(d.dlvr_empno=e.emp_no)
d.dlvr_no=#{dlvrNo}
